3: The giant killer falls right in front of you, and you finally hear the long-awaited siren.
It was an extremely dangerous night. Fortunately, it's all over—for now.
As the narrator speaks, the killer's remains decompose into ashes and disappear in the air.
Whew...
He was a tough opponent even in here...
Hmm? Something is left behind...
Kamui reaches out into the ashes and pulls something out.
It looks like a piece of metal, with some text written on it.
To Camp Inferno Trainee:
This is the last one, come and take it. Happy Halloween :D
—George Darren Toro
'To my trainees of Camp Inferno: This is the end, come and take it. Happy Halloween :D —George Darren Toro'...?
What does that mean...?
George Darren Toro... Here he is!
Ayla searches on her terminal and shows it to everyone with excitement.
Look! George Darren Toro was a renowned director of horror and action movies during the Golden Age. His famous works included 'Hellson', 'Oceanic Rim'...
Oh, I love his movies! Especially when that gigantic robot punches the other gigantic monster in the face! Kaboom!
Every time I watched it, I felt like winding back that punch and watching it again 10 times! Then another 10 times at 1/10 speed!
Oh, he also loved making the movie props as realistic as possible. Capt thinks it makes them look fake, but I love it!
But... 'The Darkening' wasn't his movie, was it?
I just searched for 'Camp Inferno' in the database. It's a third-party funded training camp for screenwriters, and Toro was the chief instructor.
I heard rumors that Toro always wrote the scripts for his own movies, then asked some random screenwriter to put their names on them. It's probably true.
This console is probably left by Toro for his students then.
But... Why?
Ayla, what kind of place is this Camp Inferno?
Hmm... Let me see, a total of 57 students attended the camp, but... It just ended without any notice?
Seems the project was just terminated. There was no follow-up news.
We need more information...
Oh, this record does have a locked section that can only be unlocked after certain requirements are met.
But I haven't detected any visit logs... Which means no one else except Toro has read the content inside.
It's a puzzle left by Toro! Now I'm hyped up!
Kamui, let me have a look at that metal plate. Maybe I can...
Ayla grabs the metal plate from Kamui and carefully examines it. She then turns to you, as if she has found something.
I knew this would have a secret layer.
Ayla inserts her fingers into the secret layer and pushes the metal plate open. There is a piece of paper inside.
Stage 1... Clear.
Suddenly, all of you lose your vision. Soon, you cannot feel or hear anything either.
Certificate confirmed. Loading Stage 2.
